lines.text: Dear fellow countrymen, just a few words to let you know that this story is going to be all about me. So, in answer to many requests, here is the story of my career... here is the story, of my career...my brilliant career. I make no apologies for sounding egotistical...because I am!
I think ugly girls should be shot at birth by their parents. It's bad enough being born a girl...but ugly and clever...
Oh, fancy you're clever, do you?
I rather hope so. I'm done for if I'm not!
I see that Furlow has bought himself a very fine bull.
That should make a few cows happy!
Perhaps they're meant to balance the ugly in life.
[while in the aviary, about the birds]
